attributes.action: Change the use of the NHS by immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To restrict the use of NHS services by immigrants, to make this a PAYG service until they have paid at least 2 years tax/national insurance's avoiding the current misuse of the system. At the moment this system is heavily under funded and the misuse is paid for by genuine Tax/Ni payers.British citizens have paid into this system for years and now it is being used by many immigrants almost as soon as they arrive in the UK

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Change the use of the NHS by immigrants."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12518.asp

Prime Minister's Office
